tasks.title: Add minimap with OpenStreetMap basemap
tasks.description:
Successfully implemented a dynamic minimap overlay showing the aircraft's real-time position and heading on an OpenStreetMap basemap. Features:
- OSMMapDisplay component: Reusable, north-oriented OSM tile renderer with (mapCenter, zoomLevel, pixelSize) parameters
- MinimapController: HUD integration with rotation, RectMask2D clipping, and centered aircraft icon
- Proper hierarchy: Minimap -> MapDisplay (OSMMapDisplay+RawImage) -> MinimapContainer (RectMask2D) -> AircraftIcon
- Live updates: Aircraft position converted from Unity -> ECEF -> LLA coordinates every frame
- Map rotation: Container rotates based on aircraft heading while aircraft icon stays upward
- Tile fetching: 3x3 tile grid with smart boundary detection and auto-fetch
- All references properly wired up and tested in play mode
